regen.absent_element: minimizing the loudspeaker volume when the handset is lifted
regen.new_specification: The system shall minimize the loudspeaker volume when the handset is lifted to transfer communication.

regen.absent_element: minimizing the loudspeaker volume when the handset is lifted
regen.new_specification: The system shall minimize the loudspeaker volume when the handset is lifted during a call.

regen.absent_element: minimizing loudspeaker volume when handset is lifted and returning to initial volume when replaced
regen.new_specification: When the handset is lifted, the loudspeaker volume shall be minimized. Once the handset is replaced, the volume shall return to its initial setting.

label: Picking up the handset shall reduce the loudspeaker volume to its minimum level.
absence: action of reducing the loudspeaker volume to its minimum level
